00023 struct SPatchInfo
00024 {
00025         SPatchInfo() { }
00026         SPatchInfo( GrPolygonUberPatch* _patch )
00027                 : patch( _patch )
00028         {
00031                 heightInTiles = ( int )Ceil( patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().y );
00032                 widthInTiles = ( int )Ceil( patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().x );
00033         }
00034 
00035         GrPolygonUberPatch* patch;
00036 
00038         int hyperGridX;
00039         int hyperGridY;
00040 
00042         unsigned int widthInTiles;
00043         unsigned int heightInTiles;
00044 };
00045 
00047 bool PatchSorter( const SPatchInfo& lhs, const SPatchInfo& rhs )
00048 {
00050         if ( lhs.hyperGridY != rhs.hyperGridY )
00051                 return ( lhs.hyperGridY < rhs.hyperGridY );
00052         if ( lhs.hyperGridX != rhs.hyperGridX )
00053                 return ( lhs.hyperGridX < rhs.hyperGridX );
00054 
00056         return ( lhs.heightInTiles > rhs.heightInTiles );
00057 }

00077 GrPolygonUberUVMapper::~GrPolygonUberUVMapper()
00078 {
00080         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < ( unsigned int )_mappings.size(); ++i )
00081                 delete _mappings[ i ];

00089 //----------------------------------------------------------
00090 void
00091 GrPolygonUberUVMapper::PlaceGroupsSlow( std::vector< GrPolygonUberPatchGroup* > groups, EPLANE movementPlane,
00092                                                                             float gridEntrySize )
00093 {
00095         const float kUVToPatchScale = GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / ( float )GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY;
00096         const float kUVToTileScale = GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES;
00097         const unsigned int kPatchBoundaryMask = GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY - 1;
00098 
00101         unsigned int kLocalGridMask = 15;
00102 
00104         const int kXAxis[ 3 ] = { 0, 0, 1 };
00105         const int kYAxis[ 3 ] = { 1, 2, 2 };
00106 
00108         const float kInvGridEntrySize = 1.0f / gridEntrySize;
00109 
00111         std::vector< SPatchInfo > patches;
00112         unsigned int groupCount = ( unsigned int )groups.size();
00113         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < groupCount; ++i )
00114         {
00116                 GrPolygonUberPatchGroup* curGroup = groups[ i ];
00117 
00119                 unsigned int patchCount = curGroup->GetPatchCount();
00120                 if ( patchCount == 0 )
00121                         continue;
00122 
00124                 patches.resize( patchCount );
00125                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < patchCount; ++i )
00126                 {
00128                         SPatchInfo& patchInfo = patches[ i ];
00129                         patchInfo.patch = curGroup->GetPatch( i );
00130 
00132                         const MVec3& loc = patchInfo.patch->GetAABox().GetCenter();
00133                         int worldGridX = ( int )( kInvGridEntrySize * loc[ kXAxis[ movementPlane ] ] );
00134                         int worldGridY = ( int )( kInvGridEntrySize * loc[ kYAxis[ movementPlane ] ] );
00135 
00137                         patchInfo.hyperGridX = worldGridX & ~kLocalGridMask;
00138                         patchInfo.hyperGridY = worldGridY & ~kLocalGridMask;
00139 
00141                         patchInfo.widthInTiles = ( unsigned int )Ceil( patchInfo.patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().x );
00142                         patchInfo.heightInTiles = ( unsigned int )Ceil( patchInfo.patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().y );
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 
00147         sort( patches.begin(), patches.end(), PatchSorter );
00148 
00150         unsigned int patchCount = ( unsigned int )patches.size();
00151         if ( patchCount == 0 )
00152                 return;
00153 
00156         _mappings.push_back( new GrPolygonUberMapping( ( unsigned int )_mappings.size() ) );
00157         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < patchCount; ++i )
00158         {
00160                 SPatchInfo& curPatchInfo = patches[ i ];
00161                 if ( curPatchInfo.patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().x < GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES &&
00162                          curPatchInfo.patch->GetUVSizeInTiles().y < GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TILES )
00163                 {
00165                         if ( !_mappings.back()->AddPatch( curPatchInfo.patch ) )
00166                         {
00168                                 _mappings.push_back( new GrPolygonUberMapping( ( unsigned int )_mappings.size() ) );
00169                                 _mappings.back()->AddPatch( curPatchInfo.patch );
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172         }
00173 }

00176 unsigned int
00177 GrPolygonUberUVMapper::GetTexturesRequired() const
00178 {
00179         return ( unsigned int )_mappings.size();
00180 }

00182 //----------------------------------------------------------
00183 void
00184 GrPolygonUberUVMapper::GenUberTextures( const UPath& path )
00185 {
00188         char buffer[ 12 ];
00189         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _mappings.size(); ++i )
00190         {
00192                 GrPolygonUberMapping* curMapping = _mappings[ i ];
00193 
00195                 sprintf( buffer, "%02d%s", i, ".uber" );
00196                 UPath fileName = path + buffer;
00197 
00199                 _uberTextures.push_back( curMapping->BuildUberTexture( fileName ) );
00200         }
00201 }
